Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to a non-partisan senate background review commission
Summary: Creates a non-partisan senate background review commission to review and verify the completeness and veracity of all background investigations of executive nominations for advice and consent of the senate.
LawCode: Add Art 5-A-1 ยง84, Leg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to a non-partisan senate background review commission
